The Fast & Furious promotion that broke the global box office record

Brief

Drive box office sales and pre-bookings for Fast & Furious 8.

Solution

We created a collection of 12 bespoke digital posters and rewarded fans who pre-booked at any cinema around the world on the first two weeks of theatrical release.

Results

Smashed global box office record, previously held by Star Wars, and activated in 52 markets with 37 languages – the largest film promotion uptake in Universal’s history.
